Scheduled maintenance: Sunday, April 7, 2024, at (10:00 CEST) 8 AM UTC
All Bitstamp services will be temporarily offline due to scheduled upgrades.

We're upgrading our infrastructure on Sunday, April 7, 2024, which means all services on our web platform and apps, including logins and signups, will be down from 8:00 AM UTC (10:00 AM CEST). This will last about 30 minutes.

After this, most of our support services should be back, but some features might be a bit slower at first. We'll keep you posted on our Twitter channel.

We apologize for any inconvenience and thank you for your patience!
